Author: Bomby57
Text: Well I don't mind that. I mind the "I don't think you need to lose weight". Like why do you need to give your opinion? I know I don't NEED to. I said I want to. Like I don't need to buy another dress but I want to, but yeah no one comments on that of fucking course üòí  He also brought it in the conversation. He was asking what I was gonna do after work. I said I have this exercise plan I'm doing (trying to get rid of arm fat...) and he said "why do you exercise?!". First, what kind of question is that lmao. Second for the obvious reasons. Trying to lose body fat, gain some muscles and lose some weight that I brought on myself because of my BFF bulimia...
